name: 2137 A.D, -  an HorrorVerse TV Series DAO
description:
Ever dreamed of owning a TV Series or an entire IP Cinematic Universe ?  “2137AD” will control  the IP Rights of "2137 AD", an Horror Cinematic Universe that will include Graphic Novels, Mobile and Y2E Games, TV Series, Books, Merchandising etc.

The Concept behind all these different Products: "It’s 2137 AD and Climate Change has hit hard. There’s a Green Sky from high CO2. Temperatures are up 9°F/5°C.  Billions died in the Apocalypse Wars for food and the few survivors are scattered in Colonies on Earth and one on Mars. The fight for survival is on.” 

Look at the material: 

1. The Visual Pitch Deck : https://tinyurl.com/arzy43y8

2. The RoadMap https://tinyurl.com/2p896u68

3. The Short Presentation & the Script https://tinyurl.com/2je5hepj

4. The Mobile Game Proposal https://tinyurl.com/yc8bd6k5
payDisclosure: I hope we will enjoy together a TV viewing of the show
